info.description:
# Usage

Submit Survey:  
\- Based on payload, the survey service stores the user answers and embed the needed information for RAG process.

Chatbot Message (Based on previous conversation)

- It send a new message based on previous conversation, the history is taken from mongo database based on conversation id from request body.
    

Chatbot Message (New conversation)

- It creates a new entry on conversation database and sends the first message, take in consideration retrieved id to continue the conversation with request from above.
